item.title: Summer Festival
item.author: Seeka Events Team
item.description: Date: May 15, 2024Description: Join us for a day of fun in the sun at our annual Summer Festival! Enjoy live music, delicious food, games, and more.

pubdate.description: Date: June 10, 2024Description: Join us for an elegant evening of dining, dancing, and fundraising at our annual Charity Gala. All proceeds will go to support local community initiatives.

Date: September 20-22, 2024Description: Dive into the latest trends and innovations in technology at our annual Technology Conference. Network with industry leaders, attend informative sessions, and explore cutting-edge technologies.
